meanings: (일정 시간 후에 저절로 터지는 폭탄) time bomb

vlive.korean: [파이널 경연 5시간 전 갑작스러운 주원의 폭탄 발언!] [Juwon's shocking statement 5 hours before the finals!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
vlive.english: [Juwon's shocking statement 5 hours before the finals!]

vlive.korean: 아미들이랑 그 물 폭탄 게임하는데 가차 없이 다 이겨버리더라 - 물 폭탄 게임 뭐야? I saw you win with no mercy when you played water bomb with ARMY. - What game? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: I saw you win with no mercy when you played water bomb with ARMY. - What game?

vlive.korean: 빌리프 폭탄크림 유명한 거 다들 아시죠? You all know that the BELIEF explosion cream is famous, right? 듣기 View video HANABONO : 김장배추만 절이니? 난 피부를 수분에 절인다! k-products that actually works
vlive.english: You all know that the BELIEF explosion cream is famous, right?

vlive.korean: 빌리프의 베스트셀러이자 빌리프의 스테디셀러인 폭탄크림 아시죠? You know BELIEF's best seller and steady seller, the explosion, cream, right? 듣기 View video HANABONO : 김장배추만 절이니? 난 피부를 수분에 절인다! k-products that actually works
vlive.english: You know BELIEF's best seller and steady seller, the explosion, cream, right?

vlive.korean: 그게 폭탄이야! That's a bomb! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 💞 고백에 성공하는 법 [김요한 이야기] EP05 해피밤

examples.korean: The bomb was primed, ready to explode. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭탄은 폭파 준비가 다 갖추어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bomb was primed, ready to explode. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ground quaked as the bomb exploded. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 폭탄이 터지면서 땅바닥이 마구 흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ground quaked as the bomb exploded. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The house rocked when the bomb exploded. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭탄이 터졌을 때 집은 마구 뒤흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house rocked when the bomb exploded. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Five shops were damaged in a firebomb blitz. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭탄 기습 공격으로 상점 다섯 곳이 파괴되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Five shops were damaged in a firebomb blitz. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Tension has heightened after the recent bomb attack. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 최근의 폭탄 공격이 있은 후 긴장이 고조되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tension has heightened after the recent bomb attack. Add to Wordbook
